results.authors: By Charlie Zhu and Jessica Sui
results.headline: China’s Big Chip Fund to Exceed $47.5 Billion Goal, Adviser Says
results.summary: China’s main national chip fund should wind up raising more than the $47.5 billion originally disclosed, a senior adviser to Beijing said, reflecting the government’s resolve to close a technology gap with the US.

results.authors: By Subrat Patnaik and Carmen Reinicke
results.headline: Nvidia (NVDA) Tops $3 Trillion in Market Value as AI Rally Steams Ahead
results.summary: Nvidia Corp. was already the world’s most valuable semiconductor firm. Now, it’s become the first computer-chip company ever to hit $3 trillion in market capitalization.

results.headline: Biden's Wrong: We Need More Solar Power
results.summary: Chinese clean technology isn’t, as the US says, “artificially cheap.” It’s just cheap — and the world needs it to meet the energy transition challenge.

results.authors: By Fahad Abuljadayel and Matthew Martin
results.headline: Saudi Arabia’s Chip Design Ambitions Take Shape With New Hub
results.summary: Saudi Arabia launched a new strategy aimed at making itself a hub for semiconductor design as the country looks to develop the industry as a means to diversify its economy away from crude oil.

results.authors: By Henry Ren and Kit Rees
results.headline: ASML Surpasses LVMH as Second-Biggest Stock in Europe
results.summary: ASML Holding NV became Europe’s second-biggest listed company, overtaking LVMH by market value for the first time ever.

results.authors: By Jillian Deutsch and Yuan Gao
results.headline: NXP, Vanguard to Build $7.8 Billion Singapore Chip Plant
results.summary: NXP Semiconductors NV is teaming up with a company partly owned by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. to build a $7.8 billion chip wafer plant in Singapore, marking a boost for the island nation’s tech ambitions.

results.authors: By Min Jeong Lee and Aya Wagatsuma
results.headline: Elliott Amasses SoftBank Stake, Wants a $15 Billion Buyback
results.summary: Activist investor Elliott Investment Management has built a sizable stake in SoftBank Group Corp. and is pushing the Japanese investment firm to launch a $15 billion buyback, according to people familiar with the matter.

results.headline: HPE Stock Trades at Record High On Strong AI Server Sales
results.summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. shares surged as much as 16% to trade at a record high after the company reported better-than-expected revenue fueled by sales of servers built for artificial intelligence work.

results.headline: ASML to Ship Its $380 Million Chip Machine to TSMC This Year
results.summary: ASML Holding NV will ship its latest chipmaking machine to Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. this year.

results.authors: By Chien-Hua Wan and Iris Ouyang
results.headline: Taiwan Central Bank Says Weak Yen Has Limited Impact on Economy
results.summary: Taiwan’s central bank said the weak Japanese yen is having only a limited impact on its economy, with the Taiwan dollar experiencing less volatility than most Asian currencies, according to a report to lawmakers seen by Bloomberg News.
